data.title: Mauro Icardi will have to pay several million to Wanda Nara if he is unfaithful to her
data.meta_description:
The life of Wanda Nara and Mauro Icardi never seems to take a break.

It is a relationship of ups and downs which always seems to be in the news, and it's happened once again
data.text:
The life of Wanda Nara and Mauro Icardi never seems to take a break.

It is a relationship of ups and downs which always seems to be in the news, and it's happened once again following a new leak regarding their life as a couple.

This time it was journalist Jorge Lanata who shared news on national television regarding the terms that the influencer, model and businesswoman set for her partner Mauro Icardi. As a result, we now know what would happen if the Argentine footballer commits a new slip up in their relationship.

The contract that Wanda Nara put pen to paper would see her receive several million dollars as compensation should Icardi be unfaithful to her.

Wanda: 200 women have passed through that mattress

A few days ago Wanda shared some intimate details on her and Icardi's relationship.

In fact, she recounted her experience about a house where Icardi lived before having a partner.

"About 200 women must have passed through that mattress, but after me the mattress was completely destroyed. The mattress no longer served him," said Wanda Nara.

Wanda Nara and Mauro Icardi married in June 2014. A few days ago it was revealed that, despite the numerous controversies during their relationship, they have decided to renew their vows.

The model confirmed the new marriage proposal in an interview with Gente magazine. A 'gift' she came up with as a way to celebrate.

"He proposed after ten years together. We haven't decided anything yet, but it was beautiful to receive his proposal," she said.
